keys: Artes visuales. Pintura y color. Plan de lección

          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring Paint</string>
            <string language="es">Exploración de la pintura</string>
            <string language="ga">Péint a Fhiosrú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschende Farbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peinture L'explorant</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Vernice D'Esplorazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερεύνηση του χρώματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An art activity encouraging children to experiment painting with a variety of painting tools.</string>
            <string language="es">Una actividad artística que anima a los niños a experimentar con la pintura utilizando varias herramientas de pintura.</string>
            <string language="ga">Gníomhaíocht ealaíne a spreagann leanaí triail a bhaint as péinteáil le huirlisí éagsúla péinteála.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales. Pintura y color. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Paint and Colour</string>
            <string language="ga">Péint agus Dath</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine kunstaktivität anregenkinder, zum Anstrich 
mit einer Vielzahl der Anstrichhilfsmittel zu experimentieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enfants encourageants d'une activité d'art à 
expérimenter peinture avec une variété d'outils de peinture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crianças incentivando de uma atividade da arte a 
experimentar pintura com uma variedade de ferramentas da pintura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bambini consiglianti di attività di arte da 
sperimentare pittura con una varietà di strumenti della pittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα τέχνης που ενθαρρύνει τα παιδιά για 
να πειραματιστεί χρωματίζοντας με ποικίλα εργαλεία ζωγραφικής.</string>
          </description>
